task_definition_name: Create Library of Stock Images/Photos related to Financial Inclusion or Microfinance
Create Library of Stock Images/Photos related to Financial Inclusion or Microfinance

text:
Hello there! I would just like to let you know that I have completed this task and am now ready for review. Here is the link to my images: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1iCTumi-TgM4_WgFcMuqG6P-4jZ-1gCGE 

I have also catalogued my images which can be found here, under the uploader name "ajcl": https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IcjgWCRU54YLqqdrTwMuWBc6OZOIRanFK_GhCsua7DY/edit#gid=0 

Thank you very much for taking the time to review my work, I truly do appreciate it. Learning about The Mifos Initiative's operations as a non-profit has been truly inspiring and I am excited to complete more tasks to assist an organisation with such an amazing mission! 
Looking forward to your reply. 
Kind regards, 
ajcl
